title: 10 Day Lean & Clean | Valley Medical Weight Loss
description: 10 Day Lean & Clean is a 10 day gentle cleansing supplement. It is a great way to kick-start any diet.
cleaned_text: What are the benefits? - Perfect Diet Kick-Starter - Relieves Constipation - Cleanses the liver and colon - Cleanses the body of toxins, heavy metals, and waste Tempe | Phoenix | Glendale | 10 Day Lean & Clean is a 10 day gentle cleansing supplement. It is a great way to kick-start any diet. It aids in detoxifying and removing the junk in your body. Cleanse, detoxify and lose weight in just 10 days with 10 Day Lean & Clean's gentle formula. It is not recommended to take any other supplementation that treats constipation when taking 10 Day Lean & Clean. There are currently no known side effects. DISCLAIMER *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. © Valley Medical Weight Loss.
